channel.title: [317] Cammy PvP [Delta]
channel.description:
[Center][i]From the owner of Cammy PvP[/i]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2nr3u4k.gif[/img] [img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/86/86/10/untitl14.png[/img]
http://uppit.com/6ngfmzgfuxb0/Phatz_PvP_Client_2.rar http://uppit.com/6ngfmzgfuxb0/Phatz_PvP_Client_2.rar http://uppit.com/6ngfmzgfuxb0/Phatz_PvP_Client_2.rar
[b][size=10pt]Hello and welcome back to Phatz PvP! Back from the good days of runescape with the old school pking. Bringing you a Cammy PvP Based server hosted on VPS lets all get together and enjoy the good old pvp :)
Features: Any other cammy pvp server normally lasts about a week or less. I am Devoted on this project, and hope to bring back what phatzpvp was and some better features. There will neverbe any rollbacks dupe to dupes, server problems, etc. This brings us to the server features: ::dice command flower game 100% pvp Changed fairy rewards Fixed headicons Fixed trading No lag, antilag system. ::votem ::voter ::voters client sided. donator zone that checks if your donator with the command and killing the dragons. custom quests Anti bombs attack npcs Fixed syi obv. changed quest tab[/size][/b]
[img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd1.png[/img] [img]http://s28.postimg.org/b0hv6ypjh/phatz_background.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x5XxISEn8fI[/youtube] [/Center]

Any other cammy pvp server normally lasts about a week or less. I am Devoted on this project, and hope to bring back what phatzpvp was and some better features. There will neverbe any rollbacks dupe to dupes, server problems, etc.
